summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6707 for the improvement of Frazier Place N.W. from N.W. 132nd St. to approximately 280 feet North thereof; and a certain other street and avenue; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance 107590, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said Roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
